# requiredAuthorizations

**Type Property**

The types of authorizations necessary for tracking images.

## Declaration

```swift
static var requiredAuthorizations: [ARKitSession.AuthorizationType] { get }
```

## Creating an image-tracking provider

- **init(referenceImages:)**: Creates an image-tracking provider that tracks the reference images you supply.
- **isSupported**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the current runtime environment supports image-tracking providers.
